text:
<@U22PKFRU5> I look forward to hearing more about a lighter version, do you have a timescale on this?
I think overall i am just nervous about the trend happening, as we have been talking to more and more clients about HubSpot.
For example CMS Enterprise Costing increases right after some functionality that was included in CMS enterprise was moved into Operations hub Pro you combine both of these and you have a massive monthly price hike

Reminder: There are lots of great ways to stay connected with what’s happening in HubSpot development. To be made aware of any changes that affect developers we recommend <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|subscribing to our developer changelog>. We post announcements about new developer facing functionality as well as communicate from there if we need to make <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/breaking-change-definition|breaking changes>.

<@U22PKFRU5> You’re talking about blog DND functionality. Is this live? Is there any docs about it? Cause if you mean there is a functionality we can use to drag (custom) modules in every single blog post, I am thrilled.
Is this validation also applicable for HS themes in other marketplace such as Themeforest?

I’m not having any luck upgrading the CLI apparently because when I run the validation command, I get:

Unknown arguments: theme, marketplace-validate
Do you have any plan to add Payoneer as your payment gateway? Now Paypal and Stripe only supported. And those are not available in my country.

<@U2H3TT8F2> <@U7SL518D6>
Is there any possibility to add Payoneer as a Payout option in near future?
